RuntimeErrorAnalysis.Summary: Invalid identifier or column name for MySQL
RuntimeErrorAnalysis.SampleLogOutput: org.springframework.jdbc.BadSqlGrammarException: StatementCallback; bad SQL grammar [select last_name from customer where id = 1]; nested exception is com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.MySQLSyntaxErrorException: Unknown column 'last_name' in 'field list'
RuntimeErrorAnalysis.RegExpPattern: org.springframework.jdbc.BadSqlGrammarException: StatementCallback; bad SQL grammar \[(.*)\]; nested exception is com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.MySQLSyntaxErrorException: Unknown column '(.*)' in 'field list'
RuntimeErrorAnalysis.ProblemDetailHtml: The $2 identifier or column name specified in the SQL statement '$1' is invalid
RuntimeErrorAnalysis.SolutionDetailHtml: Check the identifiers or column names used against the database schema
